RelatedSentence: The Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Armenia Edward Nalbandian and the Minister of Defense of the Republic of Armenia Seyran Ohanyan will pay a visit to Brussels on May 20 .
The Press , Information , and Public Relations Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Armenia informed Armenpress about this .
